characters.name: Rudo
characters.description:
__Height:__ 163 cm
__Jinki:__ "3R"

Rudo is the main character of Gachiakuta and the foster son of Regto. He is originally from the slums but was sentenced to the Abyss, due to being falsely accused of murder.

Due to being physically abused and abandoned by his parents, Rudo is emotionally closed off and introverted.

characters.name: Engine
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Cleaners
__Jinki:__ "Umbreaker"

Engine is from the Abyss and the man that saved Rudo when he fell out of the sky. He has a very bright and fun personality, but very little energy and seemingly is chill and laid-back. Despite his incredible abilities, he refers to himself as "your average janitor."

characters.name: Zanka Nijiku
characters.description:
__Height:__ 178 cm 
__Jinki:__ "Lovely Assistaff"

He’s a former Hell Guard trainee and is currently a member of the Akuta faction of the Cleaners.

characters.name: Riyou
characters.description:
__Height:__ 155 cm
__Jinki:__ "The Ripper"

She’s a former hitman and currently a member of the Akuta faction of the Cleaners. She has an unusual fighting style where she wields her large scissors with her feet. Normally cheerful and playful, she becomes strikingly pragmatic in battle.

characters.name: Chiwa
characters.description:
A girl who lives in the slums in the Sphere. [Rudo](https://anilist.co/character/266433/Rudo) likes her because of the way she seems to care and worry about him.

(Source: Official Site)

characters.name: Regto
characters.description:
The man who raised [Rudo](https://anilist.co/character/266433/Rudo) after he lost his parents. He gave Rudo a pair of gloves.

(Source: Official Site)

characters.name: Tamsy Caines
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180 cm
__Jinki:__ "Tokushin"

He is a member of the Cleaners' Team Eager. His vital instrument is a distaff and he has a calm demeanor and sharp observing eye.

characters.name: Amo Empool
characters.description:
__Height:__ 158 cm (5'2")

Amo is a teenage girl who lives in the Forbidden Zone Penta. She is able to breath in the Abyss and has seen someone who can go up to Heaven. Whilst appearing sweet and almost childlike, she is easily made emotional and will lash out at others if provoked.

Amo's vital instrument is a pair of watchmen series boots, which when worn together, can produce a 'smell'. Using her jinki, she's able to manipulate the smell and give all who breath it in hallucinations of people they treasure and thus turning them on their allies.

characters.name: Semiu Grier
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Cleaners
__Height:__ 175 cm + 8 cm Heels
__Jinki:__ "Eyes"

Semiu is very confident and professional, preferring to get on with things as quickly as possible. She is dedicated to her job, being at the janitors desk and picking up calls as soon as dawn strikes. She says to Rudo that his stability using a jinki is high, so he needs to train it.

Semiu's jinki is unique in the sense it is not used as a weapon to take down Aberrant Beasts, but rather as a tool to assess a Givers potential. Semiu is able to see the unseen, and how far one can go, which sometimes leads to shocking discoveries.

characters.name: Tomme Mima
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Cleaners
__Height:__ 167 cm

Tomme is a young woman. She is in the support Cleaners group due to her lacking a jinki of his own. She is a compassionate woman, immedietly showing concern for members of the mission trapped in the basement upon Engines arrival. She is shown visibly emotional when Engine calms her nerves about them. Later when they find out Rudo was deeply upset due to mistaking Griss for being dead, she comforts him.

Being a supporter, Tomme is tought to have a good amount of strength used to fight Aberrant Beasts.

characters.name: Abyss Workers Leader
alt_names: アビスワーカーズリーダー
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ SARAW

He is seemingly the leader of the abyss workers/human traffickers. He is overjoyed at the sight of Rudo and at first seemingly welcoming, studying Rudo as if he were a foreign species, but in mere minutes has Rudo chained up. He explains the bodies of sky people sell very well in the Abyss, because they all hate them.

~!When Rudo defeats them all, only he remains, and Rudo attempts to finish the job only to be stopped by Engine, leaving the leader passed out in shock. Some time later, he awakens to be questioned by Jabber Wongar on details of Rudo, and is promptly killed by him.!~

characters.name: Jabber Wonger
alt_names: ジャバー・ウォンガー
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Vandals
__Height:__ 183 cm
__Jinki:__ Mankira

Jabber is a Giver and is a member of the Vandals, a criminal group of givers. He is known to be an unhinged psychopath and has a violent obsession with battle; always being eager to enter a fight with a wide grin and only acknowledging those that are strong enough to compete with him. He is also a masochist, being labeled as a "super masochist" by Rudo, and finds excitement and ecstasy through pain.

characters.name: Follo Tunito
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Cleaners
__Height:__ 175 cm

Follo is a young man. He is in the support Cleaners group due to him lacking a jinki of his own, but is cultivating a 'treasured item' of his own to become a giver. 

Follo owns an hammer which he uses for combat in battle, and is potentially the jinki he's cultivating.

characters.name: Cthoni Andor
alt_names: クトーニ・アンドール
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Vandals
__Height:__ 152 cm
__Jinki:__ "Manhole"

Cthoni is a rather short, androgynous girl. She is constantly emotionless, often showing little to no expression. She is very quiet and doesn't speak up, which gives her the effect of being unnoticed and being able to sneak up on people. She is realistic in battles, as while Jabber yearns to continue an unbeatable fight, she knowns it's right to retreat. Cthoni is incredibly strong, being able to pick up Jabber who is many times her size with ease.

Using her jinki, which is a sewer manhole, Cthoni is able to teleport from one place to another quickly and quietly without notice. The manhole is able to fit one person at a time and can vanish when covered again.

characters.name: Gob
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Canvas Town

Gob is a generational Giver who could create protection charms using his marker Jinki. At some point in his life, he would inherit the generational marker jinki. Using this, he would begin to create charms using it's abilities. He created a charm around Canvas Town which prevented those with bad intentions from entering.

~!He died from contamination in the Abyss. His corpse was found, and taken to a morgue. The doctors discovered the cause to be contamination exposure. The mayor and the janitors would mourn his lose, as his jinki and legacy was passed onto the next jinki bearer.!~
